column3:
ハテノ村の少年ナブから
武器を見せて欲しいと言われた

旅人の剣を見つけたら持って行こう
column4:
A young man named Nebb in Hateno Village
wants you to show him a particular weapon.

If you find atraveler's sword, bring it to him.

column3:
ハテノ村の少年ナブが提示した武器を
全て見せた
お礼にダイヤモンドをもらった

彼の祖父も
天国で喜んでくれていることだろう
column4:
You showed Nebb, the young man in
Hateno Village, all the weapons he could
ever want to see. He rewarded you with
a diamond.

He feels that his grandfather is unquestionably
smiling down on him from the next world now.
